core.character

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.character.Character
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Monster, NPC, Player

    public abstract class Character
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public final boolean ask(java.lang.String message)
        Makes the character ask a question
        Parameters:
        message - The message sent by the caracter to the player
        Returns:
        the result of HMI.confirm, can be true or false depending on the player's choice
